Key Match Events: Bangladesh accused Virat Kohli of 'fake fielding' during the seventh over when Litton Das was batting.
Kohli motioned a shy as the ball was thrown by Arshdeep Singh, but the umpires did not take action.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan discussed the wet ground conditions with umpires and match officials.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wet ground conditions affected play and led to discussions about resuming the match.
Umpires' decisions regarding the fielding incident and the no-ball call were significant.
